1: Ikigono ikya Sabato pe kíhelaniidze, pe kwitandaaluka pa Mulungu, uMaliya Magadalena pamwinga nu Maliya uyungi, vaaheliye kulola imombwe.
2: Baaho na baaho, ikilindima kikomi kiihumilaga, pakuva umunyamwandza va Mutwa Nguluvi iikaga ukuhuma kukyanya, iihelelaga pa mombwe, iibiilusilaga pa lubali iliganga ilyo, akulikalilaga.
3: Umunyamwandza uyo aangʼaalaga uluhwano ngita lumuli lwa libalamusi, imyenda gyakwe gyali mivalafu ngita maseve.
4: Avakolakyanda avo pe vamuweene, viikoogopaga hiilo, viikagahalaga ngita váfuwe.
5: Neke kangi umunyamwandza uyo avalongelage avamwayuuva avo atigilage, “Mutane ukoogopa! Ndiidzeela ukutigila mwádzile ukumusakula uYesu ye vakamutoveleliye pa kipindulihidzo.
6: Sipwali apa! Ádzulubwike ukuhuma ku wulungu ngita kye akavalongiye. Mwadze mulole pe vakamugoniike.
7: Lino muhelelage kisaatu mukavalongele avanyigendwa vaakwe ukutigila, ‘Ádzulubwike ukuhuma ku wulungu, nave ávalonguwe ukuhelela ku Galilaya. Uko kwe kwene kwe muhadza mukumuwona.’ Lino ndívalongiye!”
8: Neke avamwayuuva avo vahegage kisaatu pa mombwe vali nu woogofi nu lukeelo lukomi. Viinyilaga kuhelela kuvalongela avanyigendwa va Yesu, ngita umunyamwandza uyo kye akavalongiye.
9: Baaho na baaho, uYesu iitaangʼanaga navo, akuvahungilaga iitigilaga, “Kamwene!” Viihegelelaga kwa Yesu, viikoleelaga amagulu gaakwe nu kumugondamila.
10: Neke uYesu avalongelage atigilage, “Mutane ukoogopa. Muhelelage mukavalongele avanyalukolo vangu vahelelage ku Galilaya kwe vahadza vakuumbona.”
11: Avamwayuuva avo pe vali mu ngʼaasi viihelela, avangi mu vakolakyanda avaaloleelaga imombwe ya Yesu, viihegaga, viikwingilaga mu wudzenge wa Yelusalemu. Viifikaga, vakuvalongelaga avateekedzi avakomi dzonda ídzihumiye.
12: Neke avateekedzi avakomi avo valundanage pamwinga na vavaha va Vayahudi, valonganage, viidiingʼanage, vavapeelage avakolakyanda avo amagoobeli goloofu.
13: Vakuvafundaga viitigilaga, “Ngana umuunu ye avedzaga akuvawuudza ulwa idzo ídzihumiye mutigilage, ‘Avanyigendwa va Yesu vakaadzile pakilo ukuhiidza umufimba gwakwe pe tukaagoneeliye.’
14: Ngana uPilato apulike idzo, tuhadza twilongana nave, ukuta mutane ukwingila mu lutalamu.”
15: Neke avakolakyanda vaanukilage amagoobeli ago nu kulonga ku vaanu, ngita kye vakaalongeliilwe na vavaha va Vayahudi. Imola idzo dziitagalilaga hiilo ku Vayahudi, kangi vaave vapisimanila ni neengʼuli.
16: Avanyigendwa vanyikyumi na yumwinga (11) viihelelaga ku Galilaya ku kidunda ikyo kye avalagiidze uYesu.
17: Uko vakumuwonaga, vakumugondamilaga, neke kangi avangi mu vanyigendwa avo vavedzage nu wugayagaya.
18: Neke uYesu ahegelelage, avalongelage avanyigendwa vaakwe atigilage, “UNguluvi áameeliye uwutawulilwe wonda uwa kukyanya nu wa mwe naanyi.
19: Lino muhelelage ku vaanu va nyi dzonda, mukavahambusage ukuvedza vanyigendwa vangu. Mukavadzabikage mu litaawa lya Daada, ni lya Muswamuve, ni lya Mubepo uMwimike.
20: Mukavawulanidzage ukuniniila dzonda dze ndívalagiidze unyeenye. Lolage, uneene ndili pamwinga naanye umusika gonda ukufikila pa wudugilo wa nyi.”
